root.cn: 这是一款看图猜名字的益智类软件，侧重于休闲，操作简单，根据风趣幽默的图片，以及图片下方列出的文字来猜指定的名称，包含名人明星、游戏动漫、城市、品牌等多方面信息，可以让玩家在玩的过程中学习新的知识，扩展知识面。
root.en: This is a puzzle app of guessing names by looking at pictures on the Pad. It focuses on leisure and is easy to operate. Guessing the designated names according to funny pictures and the words listed below the pictures, including celebrity stars, game animation, cities, brands and other information, can help players learn new knowledge and expand knowledge in the process of playing.
